name: Leya
headline: The AI workspace for lawyers
description:
Leya is an AI-powered workspace for law firms and legal professionals. 

Leya lets lawyers automate their repetitive tasks and access public sources and their own data on one single platform.

Learn more at https://www.leya.law/

founders.name: Max Junestrand, Founder
founders.description: Max is the CEO and co-founder of Leya, where he focuses on developing trustworthy AI assistants for lawyers. Prior to Leya, Max contributed to growth initiatives at two Y Combinator startups, worked at McKinsey, engaged in venture capital, and served as a software developer at Abios (acquired by Kambi) and Ericsson. He earned two degrees in machine learning and business from Sweden's top two universities, KTH and SSE, in parallel whilst working full-time.

founders.name: August Erséus, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Leya (W24). Initially pursuing a career in Psychology, fell in love with programming and turned hacker. Stockholm based.

founders.name: Sigge Labor, Founder
founders.description: Family tech support. I can reset grandparents' forgotten email passwords, and I plug in the HDMI for siblings. Graduated from Hyper Island and worked as a full-stack developer at startups since. Founded the first-ever Mexican hops company, but currently building the future of legal work at Leya (W24).

Leya
## Leya is an AI-powered workspace designed for law firms and legal professionals. Automate your repetitive tasks and access legal sources and your own data in one single platform.
Our platform
## Your new legal workspace.
Aggregate informationExtract structured data from hundreds of documents at the same time.Source within reachGet instant answers to your queries, always with highlighted citations.Endless accessibilityAccess legal sources and documents from your DMS in one interface. 
Benefits
# Enhancing legal operations.
Unlocked Knowledge
Surface previous work, policies, and templates from the depths of your organization.
Improved Outcomes
Dig deeper into your research. Proof-read in a moment. Consider more factors.
Increased Productivity
Breeze through tedious tasks and spend your time on creating value for your clients.
Bank level security
# Built with your privacy in mind.
Compliant with GDPR and certified for ISO 27001:2022 and SOC 2 Type I & II, ensuring the highest standards of privacy and security. 
[Read more](https://www.leya.law/</security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652693846fc363a3648e989e/6662a8918c546dfa7f9fd87f_Group%206.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652693846fc363a3648e989e/6662a8a93b4035e3f623284b_Group%205.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652693846fc363a3648e989e/669cdd1a974882ae02d428cd_Soc2.webp)

Features
## Let’s make your legal work flow.
Streamline legal inquiries and workflows with Leya.
### Answers to all your queries
Legal intel, just a tap away. Get accurate answers to your queries, anchored in well-cited public legal sources and your own data.
### Collaboration
Getting a second opinion has never been easier.
### Drafting
Transform inquiries into drafts in mere seconds.
### Custom public sources
Soon
Add websites you frequently visit to Leya, and we will index them for you.
### Sync your existing DMS
Soon
Leya serves as the optimal interface for tapping into the existing data within your organization.
Solutions
## Time to reach conclusions.
Lawyers use Leya to
Stay close to the sourceLeya always references the most relevant sources.Go the extra mileLeya saves time by letting you assess multiple documents at once.Get CreativeLeya helps you explore new legal strategies and innovative solutions.

About us
## Rethinking legal work
At Leya, we believe in lowering the barriers to technology within the legal sector. Artificial Intelligence won't replace lawyers anytime soon, but lawyers using it might. We prioritize building something people love, and can get started with today.
[](https://www.leya.law/<#>)
Let’s cut through the noise. You didn’t get into law to drown in paperwork. You’re here to make a dent in the universe, to solve complex problems that demand more than just your ability to read fine print. What if you could focus on what you're truly great at?
We founded Leya with the vision of giving you as a lawyer the tools you deserve. Leya transforms your practice, doing the grunt work so you can concentrate on what computers can’t: human intuition, ethical judgment, creative problem-solving.
Trust is the cornerstone of your profession. Leya enhances that trust, designed with unerring accuracy and absolute confidentiality in mind. In turn, we are entrusted by legal professionals who are determined to stay in front of their competition and bold enough to take a leap into the future.
We didn't build Leya for how law is practiced today; we built it for how it should be practiced tomorrow.
![A photo of the Leya founders](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652693846fc363a3648e989e/653637e7a8541ea853e5b386_team-leya.webp)
– The team at Leya

About us
## Rethinking legal work
At Leya, we believe in lowering the barriers to technology within the legal sector. Artificial Intelligence won't replace lawyers anytime soon, but lawyers using it might. We prioritize building something people love, and can get started with today.
[](https://www.leya.law/<#>)
Let’s cut through the noise. You didn’t get into law to drown in paperwork. You’re here to make a dent in the universe, to solve complex problems that demand more than just your ability to read fine print. What if you could focus on what you're truly great at?
We founded Leya with the vision of giving you as a lawyer the tools you deserve. Leya transforms your practice, doing the grunt work so you can concentrate on what computers can’t: human intuition, ethical judgment, creative problem-solving.
Trust is the cornerstone of your profession. Leya enhances that trust, designed with unerring accuracy and absolute confidentiality in mind. In turn, we are entrusted by legal professionals who are determined to stay in front of their competition and bold enough to take a leap into the future.
We didn't build Leya for how law is practiced today; we built it for how it should be practiced tomorrow.
![A photo of the Leya founders⟨34⟩]
– The team at Leya

generated_description:
Leya, founded in 2023 and based in Stockholm, Sweden, is an innovative startup that's part of the Y Combinator Batch W24. Its mission? To create "The AI workspace for lawyers". In simple terms, Leya is a platform designed specifically for law firms and legal professionals to automate mundane tasks and centralize access to both public legal sources and their internal data—all from one powerful interface.

With a growing team of 12 employees, Leya is heavily focused on generative AI and legal tech—two areas ripe for disruption. The company aims to enhance legal operations by allowing lawyers to streamline their workflows, improve outcomes, and ultimately elevate productivity. Imagine being able to breeze through document reviews or legal inquiries without getting bogged down in repetitive tasks; that’s the goal here.

Leya’s functionality includes features that allow users to extract structured data from multiple documents simultaneously, get instant legal answers with supporting evidence, and ensure seamless collaboration. Plus, they're serious about security—Leya complies with GDPR regulations and is certified for ISO 27001:2022 and SOC 2 Type I & II, so users can trust that their sensitive information is safe.

What’s more, feedback from users has been overwhelmingly positive. Lawyers from top firms sing Leya’s praises, highlighting its speed, innovative roadmap, and how it integrates perfectly with their existing operations.

If you’re in the legal profession and looking to amplify your efficiency while maintaining high standards of accuracy and confidentiality, Leya might just be the tool you’ve been waiting for. To learn more or see it in action, check out their [website](https://www.leya.law/).
